li.label: warcasket mechanitor
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is entombed in a warcasket. No amount of pain will have an effect on them, and they can never go into a pain shock or drop unconscious due to pain. This special warcasket designed for combat mechanitors allows {PAWN_nameDef} to perform certain kinds of work related to the use of mechanoids.
